contextId.information: This can be stated in active form. AT: "You have driven me away" or "You have sent me away" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
This can be stated in active form. AT: "let people and animals wear sackcloth" or "let people cover themselves and their animals with sackcloth" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: let both man and animal be covered with sackcloth
